title: Design and type conventions
content:
Hey there folks

Do any of you know about a website that list Graphic Design and/or Type conventions in the states or troughout the world?

Any news would be super!

Thanks

Mark

author: TheMark

comments.content:
Sorry if this seems dense, but, do you mean conferences or ways of doing things?

Cheers

Hey Dberlow...

Yeah I meant conferences ofcourse! Just wanted to pick some out to attend. But I don’t know which ones...

:o)  
Mark
